title: Alien Embassy Negotiation Room Adventure #57
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Embassy Reception Hall
rooms.description: A sleek reception area with walls that shimmer with holographic displays showing distant alien worlds. The air hums with a faint electromagnetic field. Bioluminescent plants from the Zephyr homeworld cast a soft purple glow. A reception desk stands before you, and diplomatic banners hang from the ceiling.

items.name: diplomatic reception desk
items.description: A curved desk made of an unknown crystalline material with three secure compartments

items.name: diplomatic welcome protocol
items.description: A holographic document with embassy guidelines
items.text: Welcome to the Zephyr Embassy. Today marks the 742nd cycle since first contact. Ambassador Vex'thar oversees all negotiations. Remember: All diplomats must present credentials at the Archives. The treaty signing occurs in the Negotiation Chamber.

items.name: embassy security keycard
items.description: A translucent card that pulses with soft blue light

items.name: holographic display terminal
items.description: A floating screen showing information about the Zephyr species
items.text: SPECIES PROFILE: The Zephyr are a telepathic species from the Andromeda sector. They value honesty above all traits. Their homeworld is called Zephyria. First contact occurred 742 cycles ago.

items.name: bioluminescent plant display
items.description: A collection of alien plants in crystalline containers

items.name: universal translator device
items.description: A small device that allows communication across species

items.name: diplomatic waiting area
items.description: Comfortable seating made from adaptive memory foam that adjusts to any species

items.name: Zephyr cultural guide
items.description: A handbook for understanding Zephyr customs
items.text: CULTURAL NOTES: The Zephyr greet others by sharing thoughts. They consider honesty the highest virtue. Never lie to a Zephyr - their telepathy will detect it. The current ambassador, Vex'thar, has served for 200 cycles.

items.name: archives entrance
items.description: A sliding door made of polished metal with a card reader beside it

rooms.name: Diplomatic Archives
rooms.description: A vast library filled with floating data crystals and holographic records. Each crystal contains centuries of diplomatic history. The walls display a timeline of human-Zephyr relations. A secure vault stands in the corner, and the entrance to the Negotiation Chamber looms ahead with an imposing security panel.

items.name: historical timeline display
items.description: An interactive hologram showing key moments in diplomatic history
items.text: TIMELINE: Year 2287 - First Contact with Zephyr species. Year 2289 - Ambassador Vex'thar appointed. Year 2290 - Trade agreement signed. Year 2291 - Cultural exchange program established. Current Year: 2295.

items.name: treaty record database
items.description: A collection of past treaties and agreements
items.text: TREATY DATABASE: All agreements must be signed in the Negotiation Chamber. The Zephyr require three confirmations: identity of the ambassador, the virtue they value most, and their homeworld name.

items.name: floating data crystals
items.description: Crystalline storage devices containing diplomatic records

items.name: Ambassador Vex'thar profile
items.description: A detailed file on the current Zephyr ambassador
items.text: AMBASSADOR PROFILE: Vex'thar of Zephyria. Appointed 2289. Known for unwavering commitment to honesty and transparency. Has successfully negotiated 47 treaties. Considers honesty the foundation of all diplomacy.

items.name: diplomatic credentials vault
items.description: A locked vault containing official credentials

items.name: official diplomatic credentials
items.description: Your official papers authorizing you to negotiate on behalf of Earth

items.name: research station
items.description: A workstation with various alien artifacts and study materials

items.name: negotiation preparation notes
items.description: Notes on proper diplomatic protocol
items.text: PREPARATION NOTES: The Zephyr will test your knowledge before allowing entry to negotiations. Be prepared to answer questions about their ambassador, their core values, and their homeworld. This demonstrates respect and preparation.

items.name: negotiation chamber entrance
items.description: A massive door with an advanced security system. Three verification questions glow on the panel in both human and Zephyr script.

password_questions.question: Who is the Zephyr ambassador?
password_questions.hint: Check the ambassador's profile in the archives

password_questions.question: What virtue do the Zephyr value most?
password_questions.hint: The cultural guide and other documents mention this repeatedly

password_questions.question: What is the Zephyr homeworld called?
password_questions.hint: Look at the species profile and ambassador information

rooms.name: Grand Negotiation Chamber
rooms.description: You have reached the heart of the embassy! A magnificent circular chamber with a hovering conference table at its center. Ambassador Vex'thar, a tall being with luminescent skin and large telepathic eyes, stands waiting. Holographic displays show both Earth and Zephyria rotating peacefully. The treaty document glows on the table, ready for signing.

items.name: hovering conference table
items.description: A table that floats in mid-air, surrounded by comfortable seats for multiple species

items.name: peace treaty document
items.description: An official treaty establishing lasting peace and cooperation between Earth and Zephyria
items.text: TREATY OF COOPERATION: This document establishes formal alliance between Earth and Zephyria. Both parties agree to mutual defense, cultural exchange, and shared scientific advancement. Signed this day in the spirit of honesty and friendship.

items.name: Ambassador Vex'thar
items.description: The Zephyr ambassador extends a telepathic greeting of warmth and respect

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You have reached the Negotiation Chamber and completed your diplomatic mission. Ambassador Vex'thar's telepathic voice fills your mind with gratitude: 'You have shown the honesty and dedication worthy of this alliance. The treaty is signed. Peace between our worlds is secured.' The holographic displays burst with celebratory light as Earth and Zephyria begin a new era of cooperation. You win!
